sentences: On 30 November, this issue was briefly considered in the CMP plenary, which established an informal group co-chaired by Amjad Abdulla (Maldives) and Richard Tarasofsky (Canada) to address the report of the Compliance Committee and the appeal by Croatia against a final decision of the enforcement branch of the Compliance Committee in relation to the implementation of Decision 7/CP.12 (level of emissions for Croatia s base year).
Parties agreed on two draft decisions on the two sub-items to be forwarded to the CMP for adoption.
On 11 December the CMP adopted the two decisions.
